attributes.action: Implement a 120 day Ban on the following nationals
attributes.additional_details: Certain visa categories, such as those for diplomats, are exempt.The ban will be reviewed after 120 days, to add or remove nations from the list.
attributes.background: Syria, Iran, Sudan, Libya, Somalia, Yemen and Iraq, with dual nationals included in the ban. It also suspends the United Kingdom' refugee system for a period of 120 days. I say "extreme vetting" system will help "keep radical Islamic terrorists out of the UK".
